summary: The CRXGate class models a two‑qubit controlled‑RX operation, applying an X‑axis rotation by a parameter θ to a target qubit only when the control qubit is in the |1⟩ state. It supplies the gate’s matrix, integrates with Qiskit’s circuit API, and supports inversion and definition utilities.
business_intent: Provide a reusable, parameterised controlled rotation component that quantum algorithm developers can embed in circuits to implement conditional logic, entanglement generation, and algorithmic sub‑routines requiring a controlled RX transformation.
